attributes.action: keep the congestion charge for the city centre but abandon the planned congestion charge to pass the M60 ring road around Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Charge for entering the city centre by all means but do not charge people for passing the motorway ring road.  Many people in Manchester are separated from their essential services, childcare, family or local shops by the motorway.  You can't choose what time you get an appointment or drop your children off before work.  This could affect many aspects of family life, meal times etc.  This will mainly affect the less well off.  Don't charge us Mancunians for living our lives.
